website_summaries.verdict: A set made from cobalt-steel alloy that includes a variety of sizes.
pros: A good set for standard projects
Bits do not tend to get as hot as others while drilling
With lubricant they work well on hard metals
cons: Some customers feel like these bits dull too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Best part is the case
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since they were advertised as cobalt steel, but only after a handful of uses they dull so that you can barely drill through brass. I think that they are not even cobalt steel. Chinese crap like most everything else that the Chinese make. I think that these are a total scam and the number of positive reviews must be fake. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: erik g.

customer_reviews.title: I feel violated
customer_reviews.text: I have been fabricating stainless steel railing posts and decided to invest in a really good set of cobalt bits. After drilling 100 1/8 inch pilot holes with a single Amoolo bit (separately reviewed), 60 3/16 holes and 20 1/4 inch holes, each with only one non-Irwin drill bit, I tried the Irwin bits. Using the same speed and lubrication as my prior 180 holes, one Irwin bit drilled 4 holes, and one managed 3 before they were ruined. I can't return them as they are not in "new or like new" condition. I now have a $92 drill organizer. I am sick about this purchase. I can't stress this enough: DON'T BUY THESE BITS. THEY ARE JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: wlw

customer_reviews.title: I finally know what quality is
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of other drill bits barely drilling into steel and then breaking. Spent some money and it was so worth it. Pros: Cut like butter, maybe too well on mild steel In the drill press these work amazing, nice clean cuts. Cons: Without a hex/flatted shank these bite and dig quickly so in a battery powered hand chuck drill the bit ends up catching and the drill keeps spinning around because it can't hold the bit still. These are so sharp and durable though you can step back and nibble it away with some care.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance bits
customer_reviews.text: Poor, dissatisfied, took 6 bits to drill four 3/8 " hole in a 1/2 cold rolled steel plate. Paid the higher price expecting to get the quality and performance the Irwin company brags ABOUT. Wrong choice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Will actually drill through "normal" drill bits!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the extra money. These cobalt's are not just some coating or fancy marketing tactic. They are actually a cobalt-steel alloy that is harder than normal high speed steel. I saw a review earlier that said you could drill through normal drill bits with these, so I thought why not give them a try. I put the 3/16" cobalt bit in my drill press and drilled down into an old craftsman high speed steel bit. It worked, no apparent damage to the cobalt. I am not sure why I didn't invest in a good set of drill bits 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: mghpz27

customer_reviews.title: Just so so, Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: I'll let the other reviews stand for themselves when it comes to the negative reviews which are all true. The one other thing that I want to mention is the printed bit size on the plastic case. They used medium gray ink printed on dark blue plastic. You'll need strong light and magnifier to make out the writing. The case also doesn't close completely tight. I use for aluminum only but I don't think they will last. I would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Quality set at very good price
customer_reviews.text: Good drill set for the price. This is my second set. We ground the first set to nothing in a part time fab shop over the course of several years. Had them sharpened once. May still sharpen the old set but for how we use them a new set every few years is acceptable. Good range of sizes. Quality made. Extra bits for the smallest sizes. Use some lubrication on metal jobs and they will be a good addition to any shop.
customer_reviews.author: MadScientist

customer_reviews.title: Would have been better if sharper
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Some youngsters don't like them because the run them too fast in metal. In wood, aluminium and plastic you can run these at high speed. But on steel you need to use a very low speed. The steel should peel up in short strips. Otherwise the leading edge will heat and then blunt. That being said, I had to sharpen them all in my Drill Doctor because they did not come sharp enough out of the box. Once sharpened, however, and if you run them slowly in steel, they work and last fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform as advertised. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: These bits are supposed to cut through cast iron. False advertising! Tried to drill one 1/8" hole, starting with a smaller bit, through a cast fence post that is 3/8" thick. Took me 15 minutes. Even used cutting oil, thinking that might speed things up. Dream on. The bits also have smooth shafts so they easily slip in the chuck while drilling anything with modest resistance. Highly recommend you pick a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman49

customer_reviews.title: YOU WONT BE DISAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: WELL I HESITATED ON BUYING THESE DRILL BITS BUT THEY DID HAVE GOOD REVIEWS AND IM GLAD I DID AS I HAD TO DRILL OUT BROKEN EXHAUST BOLTS & STUDS IN MY 1994 FORD RANGER WITH OVER 420,000 MILES THE ONLY THING I HAD TO DO IS PUT A AIR LIMITER ON MY AIR DRILL THEN JUST KEEP ADDING THE CUTTING OIL I BOUGHT WITH THE BITS ALL AND ALL IT DID THE JOB THAT I NEEDED TO GET DONE
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. VANSLYKE

customer_reviews.title: Great drill bits
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits are tough and the case is nice. I would have given 5 stars but it came 1 drill bit short. The 11/32 was missing. Otherwise I highly recommend these. Ive drilled into rolled steel, bar stock and DOM tubing with 0 issues at all. I use them almost every weekend on metal rojects and they barely even look worn. I would put them right up there with my Snap-On bits I replaced with these after several years of use.
customer_reviews.author: iluvdrt

customer_reviews.title: Great drill bits
customer_reviews.text: These are great bits. All of them are razor sharp and dead straight. The ones I've used and measured are perfectly sized. The only thing I didn't like was how the box closes. It's a pain to get it open and also to get it fully closed and latched. They could have come up with a better design for how the box latch mechanism works.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't think about it, just buy these. They're amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally snapped a hardened exhaust stud on my motorcycle using a harbor freight torque wrench, should of known better lol. Burnt up the standard and "titanium" coated bits I had very quickly without getting through much of the broken stud. Got these, literally drilled it out in about a minute going pretty slowly with my drill. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne II

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, opened it up and progressively drilled up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, opened it up and progressively drilled up to 1/8" to extract a sheared bolt with no issues. Be sure to use some kind of lubricating oil like CLP or Seafoam DeepCreep to keep the cutting edge happy and stop periodically to blow out your chips. Also, using a center punch to get started is a must. I'm glad that I got this drill set and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Junk Junk Junk
customer_reviews.text: These bits are horrible! To start with they are dull and will not drill through practically anything other than wood and if you do get one started to drill through metal it will crack and break on you. I paid a premium price for junk fake looking drill bits that Irwin passes off as high quality. I would give anything to get my money back cuz these were not worth $0.01!
customer_reviews.author: Max Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised and disappointed in this product. 1 broke the very first time I tried to use them. Was drilling thin aluminum. Absolutely no reason it should have broken off. World not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: PKB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: The index for the boys arrived bent and broken. It basically fell apart Dorothe unboxing. Didn’t even get a chance to use the bits before deciding to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cobalt Drill Bit set with holder...
customer_reviews.text: Hi...This is the Perfect Cobalt Drill bit set.....What makes it great..is the Really great Hoider..Many drill bit holders are poorly engineered...This holder is locking...the drill bits are securely held...This Cobalt Drill Bit set is perfect...I had much trouble with Drill Bit holders..The set is even affordable...The holder even locks...Perfect!!!...Cobalt bits are best...Even affordable...Thanks..This set is Perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Wappula

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Description says it is 8% Cobalt. It is 5%, falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nisbo

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits are good on soft metals
customer_reviews.text: Drill bits are good on soft metals. Not so good on hard metals. A little to pricey for what you get out of the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I have used the drills on (8) 1/2 inch stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the drills on (8) 1/2 inch stainless steel bolts, drilled through to insert cotter pins so far no damage. I would buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: R. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bits
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic drill bits. I needed to drill out a steel bolt that had broken off in a bicycle carrier, went through several bits before purchasing these; they went through the steel like it was butter.
customer_reviews.author: j d midyette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas gifts for all of my employees at our Christmas party. Our work requires a lot of drilling through aluminum and steel. These were hands down the best buy that I found.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Some GOOD drill bits!
customer_reviews.text: After looking around at several big box stores and not being able to find a decent set of bits, I went to Amazon and found these Cobalt alloy bits. I checked out Irwin's web site and noticed the line "suitable for drilling armor". These drills are pricey but worth every cent. When they arrived I decided to test them out. I drilled a 9/64" hole in the shank of my old sets 1/2" bit. Not a problem! Bit not only drilled the hole throwing chips of steel off but never got hot. This old set was from Northern Tool and was advertised as "Titanium coated. Would give them more than 5 stars if allowed. R
customer_reviews.author: Janice W. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Far superior to Dewalt and Milwaukee
customer_reviews.text: After burning up all my DeWalt black oxide drill bits on the 1st, 2nd or 3rd use it was definitely worth the upgrade to these. Milwaukee’s titanium set sucks too.
customer_reviews.author: b johnson

customer_reviews.title: I own another set which is even better but twice as costly
customer_reviews.text: High Quality Set. You MUST use these at low speed or they will dull/burn. They will drill bolts well. I own another set which is even better but twice as costly. I use them, my technicians use these.
customer_reviews.author: hevster

customer_reviews.title: Drilled right through my hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I needed a drill bit that could pierce my computer's old hard drive, so I could render the drive useless before recycling it. These bits did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: N. D. Gumby

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy. I’m just a hobby builder, these are More than meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Dump the Case!
customer_reviews.text: The bits are fine and of decent quality. I threw the case in the trash. The case is bulky, heavy, and doesn't line up well to close. I moved the bits to a 20 year old case that's half the size and weight, and still closes!
customer_reviews.author: mike reid

customer_reviews.title: toughest bit around
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Tried other bits of various material. This is the only one that worked
customer_reviews.author: Billy Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Stepped down Shank on Larger Sizes
customer_reviews.text: They are a little brittle and have a stepped down shank on the larger sizes. Not the quality I expected but are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Baughan

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Bits.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set of bits with a good case for any small project. Can't say these are perfect for a professional setup but good for any standard project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Case
customer_reviews.text: The bits are fine. I'm not a fan of the awkward case that can be finicky to open & close.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Shy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought to drill out seized bolts. Works without damage to the drills. I take it easy and use coolant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable with proper usage
customer_reviews.text: Drilling hardened steel one must keep the bit cool. If you don't, it will not last. This is true with all bits.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Morris

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE REALLY GOOD BITS
customer_reviews.text: THESE BITS CUT GREAT, DON'T DULL EASILY. BEST BITS I HAVE OWNED SO FAR. SET WAS 80 BUCKS.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Used drilling oil and they worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: Drilled out 4 male lug nuts that sheared off. Used drilling oil and they worked great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Cuts through steel like butter.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 1/4" hardened steel bar I needed to drill through. I bought Milwaukee bits at first which were absolute garbage. After returning those, I ordered these with less than high expectations. They were far better! Just make sure you are patient and go very slow with drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dube'

customer_reviews.title: Dulls quickly
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick does not stay sharp when drilling SS screws, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd J Roe

customer_reviews.title: Good set of bits for steel
customer_reviews.text: I do a good deal of work in steel fab. These bits a godsend as they hold an edge, and will drill multiple holes with no issues. For sheet metal they work great, and cut nice and quick. For thicker steel, 1/8" and up I recommend a small amount of cutting oil, and using a drill press if possible. They will not last forever, and I highly recommend buy something like a DrillDr to touch them up from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bos

customer_reviews.title: Best Cobalt bits out there for the money.
customer_reviews.text: High quality bits. I won’t buy anything but Cobalt bits for drilling harder metals. They cut ribbons out of cast iron and steel easily.
customer_reviews.author: mtrsprt

customer_reviews.title: Good Drills
customer_reviews.text: These work great for thick Aluminum storm doors. I haven't tried them on denser metal but I'm sure they'll work
customer_reviews.author: blazintommyd

customer_reviews.title: Half the set missing
customer_reviews.text: Bits used and 15 bits missing. This is not cosmetic
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Havent used this yet, it is a Christmas present to myself, lol. More to come.
customer_reviews.text: Havent used this yet, it is a Christmas present to myself, lol. More to come.
customer_reviews.author: AK Wireless

customer_reviews.title: These are great bits
customer_reviews.text: These are great bits. First time I used one of these bites was on steel that had been hardened, went through that like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W.

customer_reviews.title: No decimal sizes for the bits
customer_reviews.text: Huge range of drill sizes. It would be nice if the decimal sizes of the bits appeared in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton E. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Did the job very well. Sharp, cut well, just a drop of cutting oil and went slow so as not to overheat. Broke three high speed steel drills on the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon B. West

customer_reviews.title: this is a christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: the review should not have been requested yet. person won't receive it til christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Nancyk4

customer_reviews.title: Great bits !
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a few of these bits. I compared them directly to HSS drill bits of the same size, using the same speed and lubrication. These Irwin cobalt bits showed much less wear and remained very sharp! They are worth the extra money. I drilled mild steel first. I am happy with my purchase and would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Delwin Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Yoo need these bits!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these drill bits. Look no further. Was fed up with crappy bits and reasearched best drill bits and found these. Expensive but worth it. Just drilled 2- 7/16 inch holes through half inch plate. Ate right through. Other bits wouldn't touch it. Be careful with a hand held drill. Will twist your arm off if it catches.
customer_reviews.author: Drive 911

customer_reviews.title: Best drill bit index ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this kit for YEARS! Only broken a couple of the small bits. They stay sharp for a long time and I still use it frequently to this day. MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hume

customer_reviews.title: Good for knife making
customer_reviews.text: My son needed drill bits that would cut unhardened 1095 tool steel, so I ordered him some of these. They work well, don't appear to have dulled yet, and were affordable.
customer_reviews.author: jason bowker

customer_reviews.title: Industrial grade product.
customer_reviews.text: Industrial grade. Pay for what you get so price reflects excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be very good quality, tried out the 9/32" and it zipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be very good quality, tried out the 9/32" and it zipped right through a piece of 1/8" inch steel. Case is extremely nice as well, 3/8" and larger have a smaller shank so you can use the bigger bits with a 3/8 drill chuck. 5 stars for now, we'll see how they hold up this year
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They do what they're supposed to. They haven't broken yet which is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Supposedly made to drill through stainless and hard metal even after using drill lube at a low speed I could not drill even 1/8 of an inch through stainless before the bit was smoked.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy joe allison jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case but my only complaint is how it opens
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case but my only complaint is how it opens. I can’t seem to get used to it it always feels like you’re opening it upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great drills, goofy box.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Drills seem to hold an edge well. The box however is goofy.
customer_reviews.author: Licensed Aquaculture Facility

customer_reviews.title: after 3x hand drilling a 1/2" hole stepping up 1/32" ...
customer_reviews.text: after 3x hand drilling a 1/2" hole stepping up 1/32" at a time in aluminum plate less than 1/8" thick--15/32" drill bit snapped. not expected for such an expensive product. aluminum is not very difficult drill through.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very complete drill set and bits are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Drilling holes through 1/4 inch hard steel, reenforcing shop door
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for drilling holes in stainless, black steel pipes, and even hardened steel. Only had one bust out on me due to hand drilling at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I own three boxes of these
customer_reviews.text: Just a very good set of drill bits. Tough and stay sharp longer. Sharpen easily. I have two sets at the ranch and another at the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Karger

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: These cobalt drill bits are great! Regular titanium coated bits or carbide bits do not compare with cobalt bits, at all. With these I was able to drill quickly - really quickly - through steel that was dulling my titanium bits, even with oil. It's always best to use a couple drops of any oil when drilling to keep the temperature down and avoid wear. You will not be disappointed with these bits.
customer_reviews.author: TW Barney

customer_reviews.title: Real Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great drill bits. Makes holes faster and easier than any I have used before. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: They can drill through anything - if you keep them cool.
customer_reviews.author: BillD

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used to drill out wheel studs and worked better than Harbour Freight junk
customer_reviews.author: rcb

customer_reviews.title: So glad to have bought this quality set of bits that ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have bought this quality set of bits that don't break as easily as other supposedly "quality" bits. I really like the metal case with rubber as well. I hope Irwin continues to have attention to detail and sale quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: A Professional set of drill bits
customer_reviews.text: A very nice - well built, sharp m strong set of drill bits in a nice case. I gave up on the cheap stuff long ago but even that goes bad in time so this is my new base set. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Drills steel like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to drill through stainless steel. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Irwin -  A great name in tools.
customer_reviews.text: these bits are awesome. Do yourself a favor and spend some money on drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Trying to find a few replacement bits.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Strong drill bits for drilling hardened steel
customer_reviews.text: Broke an extractor trying to get a broken bolt out. Most of my current drill bits were not able to penetrate the hardened steel. These drill bit with some cutting oil did the trick and i was able to eventually drill out the extractor.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, I finally ordered them after looking at them for a while and I'm glad I did. These are some of the best drill bits I have ever used. I spent a good hour just drilling holes in random metal in my garage, never missed a beat.
customer_reviews.author: rjm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good product. No complaints. Gave them to my Brother in law who is a mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: These guys did a great job. I hid them in a safe spot ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to drill and tap a piece of steel and my 'normal' drill bits couldn't cut it. These guys did a great job. I hid them in a safe spot so they don't get used (lost, broken) for lesser tasks that normal bits can do.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very quality drill bits
customer_reviews.text: very timely delivery, Item was as described. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: allan barry

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far for drilling harder steel
customer_reviews.text: Very good so far for drilling harder steel. Will have to see how long the cutting edge stays sharp. I have only used them a few times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Schlotterback

customer_reviews.title: good set solid case
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully for stainless steel haven't even used my Drill Doctor yet.. EDIT ....Stolen.... argggggggg....bought another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan JefferiesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great bits
customer_reviews.text: great set of bits. Needed a set for work. good variety of sizes and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A great value in the set, with very long lasting bits and a very sturdy metal index case.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Has really held up over time. Very satisfied with these bits.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. The way the box opens and closes is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Demon

customer_reviews.title: not very good....
customer_reviews.text: tried them out today and drilled 2 holes through the frame of a car, and after the holes were drilled both drill bits chipped around the tip!!! I thought I will have these for a long time initially, but I don't anymore. I wish I would have known this beforehand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cobalt bits
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cobalt bits. No issues here after about a year. A bit more expensive than black oxides, but well worth it when going thru any type of steel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong bits- hold their edge well. Nice complete set of bits
customer_reviews.text: This set is quite HEAVY, but so far so good. I wanted the cobalt bits because they stay sharp longer and work well when having to drill though metal. Cobalt bits are more brittle due to their hardness, so be careful not to "flex" them when drilling
customer_reviews.author: T-Weeder Tool

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, works well. Packed well and shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: Bucknroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my last set. From those other guys.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing what these do compared to regular drill bits. Wish I knew about these before
customer_reviews.author: Four Seasons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are sharp and bite right into the metal. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased these. Have never had a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp drill,,, finally.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of drills, the storage box not so much. Hard to get open.
customer_reviews.author: SteveGord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I had to enlarge a hole into hardened steel and every other drill bit I had wouldn't even scratch it. These drill bits made the hole that I needed. Granted I had to stop occasionally to allow the drill, bit, and metal to cool back down, but it eventually went through. Highly impressed. I will be looking at more cutting tools with Cobalt infused metal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY good Drill bits! None better that I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, sharp cobalt bits
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, sharp cobalt bits. They hold their edge well. I'm not sure how the case will hold up over time but I am happy with the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: So drill bits are one of those things that you absolutely cannot go cheap on if you're using them for anything more than a single hole in drywall. Nothing is more annoying than being in the middle of a project and your drill bit breaks. These are the ones you want. Absolutely terrific quality, these hold up to serious abuse. I have used them in metal and wood applications and they handle it no problem. Highly recommend if you use drill bits much.
customer_reviews.author: blakes68

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Always liked irwin products but when I got my drill bit set it was missing 5 bits. For that I'm leaving 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality set I have ever bought.  I am now a customer for life.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best drill bits I have ever owned. I'm no professional, but I do my share of repairs and DIY projects and I will never buy any other type of bit. Last winter a couple of bolts where sheared off on my snowblower (not the shear pins) and left the threaded portion of the hardened steel bolt inside without the heads. After trying an easy out (which never works for me) I decided to drill them out and these bits (which were far from new at the time) did the job. "Big deal" you might think, but I challenge you to drill through a grade 8 hardened steel bolt with anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BIT SET!
customer_reviews.text: These are made by the people who make VISE GRIPS.They cut really well!Every time I have used them they perform great,drilling out screws has been a pleasure with this set.I really like the case a lot also.A great buy here at Amazon for the price,my local parts store wanted double the money for this set.Not one has broken or had to be sharpened yet,I do not use these daily but I could see how you could easily with the same results,worth the money indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: It looks really good but only time will tell if it is as ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good but only time will tell if it is as good as it looks. Irwin quality is all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: alberto

product_meta.title: Irwin Industrial Tools Metal Index Drill Bit Set and Industrial Bolt Extractor Set
feature_bullets: Constructed of M-42 8 percent cobalt high speed steel for super abrasive resistance in tough metals
Cobalt steel extends cutting edge life and maintains cutting life after resharpening
Frees rounded-off, rusted-tight or painted-over bolts
Reverse spiral flutes are designed to bite down to provide maximum gripping power
